name: Connoisseur

grantsPowers.name: Finer Things
grantsPowers.description: Increase Chance to Harvest Gems, Grave Goods, and Hunger Shard Additives

grantsPowers.name: Harvesting Power
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Gain Harvest Power Pips while Harvesting

description: Some may consider the Connoisseur to be a rather persnickety personality to deal with, but anyone who prefers the finer things in life will mention that the trade in for a bit of extra work pays off greatly. A distinguished partiality can help differentiate between qualities and may also grant even greater rewards.
lore: I am a devotee to the finer things.
